DOC.brief_title: Effects Replacing Diet Beverages With Water Weight Loss Plasma Glucose Control Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diabetic female patient 6.5 < H1AC < 7.2 . Monotherapy Metformin . 1845 year age . Body mass index ( BMI ) 2735 kg/ mÂ² . Consume DBs regularly habitual diet . Must able moderate exercise . Must interested weight loss . Participating research project involve weight loss physical activity previous six month . Pregnancy lactation previous 6 month , plan pregnancy next six month . Taking medication could affect metabolism change body weight . Report heart problem , chest pain , cancer within last five year . Unwilling change intake beverage study period .
